name: accessionNumberSUSMirri
displayName: Unique identifier of the strain in the CC.

name: organismTypeSUSMirri
displayName: The organism type of the microorganism

name: speciesSUSMirri
displayName: The species of the strain followed, when appropriate, by the subspecies name. For hybrid strains, more than one species can be specified. The semicolon “;” must be used as a separation character.

name: beforeNagoyaSUSMirri
displayName: The attribute specifies whether the strain has been collected before 12 October 2014.

name: useRestrictionsSUSMirri
displayName: Report if the strain can be used for commercial development or not.

name: nagoyaConditionsSUSMirri
displayName: Situation of the strain in relation to the Nagoya protocol. Mandatory if BeforeNagoya is ‘No’.

name: riskGroupSUSMirri
displayName: Risk group according to EU Directive 2000/54/EC and its amendments and corrections. Mandatory if the species is known.

name: formOfSupplySUSMirri
displayName: The forms of supply of the strain to users.

name: recommendedMediumGrowthSUSMirri
displayName: The acronym of the growth medium.

name: useRestrictionsSUSMirri
dataverseAlias: For commercial development a special agreement is requested

name: nagoyaConditionsSUSMirri
dataverseAlias: No known restrictions under the Nagoya protocol

name: nagoyaConditionsSUSMirri
dataverseAlias: Documents providing proof of legal access and terms of use available at the collection

name: nagoyaConditionsSUSMirri
dataverseAlias: Strain probably in scope, please contact the culture collection
